info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 1:28PM MST until July 27 at 3:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHEASTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 128 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area with radar estimating between 2 and 3 inches of rainfall. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations in the warning area include... Roads in and around Mt. Trumbull, Bar Ten Ranch, Mt. Trumbull, Toroweap Campground and Tuweep. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
